# statusBarStyle

**Instance Property**

The current appearance of the status bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var statusBarStyle: UIStatusBarStyle { get }
```

## Discussion

To customize the status bar’s style for each of your view controllers, override their [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/preferredStatusBarStyle] property.

## Getting the status bar configuration

- **isStatusBarHidden**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the status bar is currently hidden.
